data.lyric:
[ti:blue christmas]
[ar:elvis presley]
[al:128000]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:01.36]I'll have a Blue Christmas without you
[00:10.05]I'll be so blue just thinking about you
[00:20.85]Decorations of red on a green Christmastree
[00:33.80]Won't be the same dear  if you're not here with me
[00:42.07]And when those blue snowflakes start fallin'
[00:52.51]And when those blue melodies start callin'
[01:03.33]You'll be doin' all right 
[01:08.81]With your Christmas of white 
[01:14.17]But I'll have a blue  blue  blue  blue Christmas
[01:27.38]
[01:43.88]You'll be doin' all right 
[01:48.93]With your Christmas of white 
[01:54.17]But I'll have a blue  blue  blue  blue Christmas
data.trans:
[ti:blue christmas]
[ar:elvis presley]
[al:128000]
[by:帅]
[offset:0]
[00:01.36]我会有一个没有你的蓝色的圣诞节
[00:10.05]我会如此忧郁，只是想着你
[00:20.85]绿色的圣诞树上点缀着红色饰物
[00:33.80]亲爱的，如果你不在我身边，这将会不同
[00:42.07]当那些蓝色的雪花开始落下
[00:52.51]当那些蓝色的旋律开始奏起
[01:03.33]你会比现在更好
[01:08.81]你拥有的是白色的圣诞节
[01:14.17]而我拥有的是一个蓝色的，蓝色的，蓝色的，蓝色的圣诞节
[01:27.38]
[01:43.88]你会比现在更好
[01:48.93]你拥有的是白色的圣诞节
[01:54.17]而我拥有的是一个蓝色的，蓝色的，蓝色的，蓝色的圣诞节
[02:04.42]
